mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee (firstname, lastname, age, hired_at) VALUES (#{instance.firstname}, #{instance.lastname}, #{instance.age}, #{instance.hiredAt})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM employee WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT employee_number, firstname, lastname, age, hired_at FROM employee WHERE employee_number = #{id}
SELECT employee_number, firstname, lastname, age, hired_at FROM employee ORDER BY id
